data.name: Hello Charlotte EP2: Requiem Aeternam Deo
data.detailed_description:
Intro

Hello, new Puppeteer!
Meet Charlotte — a Puppet you will control. Meet her alien friends, maggot cat and a certain Observer.
Dive deep into horrors of junk food, TV world, religion and romance novels for middle-aged women. Keep your puppet safe at all times. Or don't.

Have fun dying!

Description


Hello Charlotte is an episodic game, where each episode can be considered a separate story,
as they differ in storytelling style, themes and illustrations, but the characters stay the same.

This story, Hello Charlotte: Requiem Aeternam Deo, is the second installment of the Hello Charlotte series.
Hello Charlotte, Episode 1: Junk Food, Gods and Teddy Bears can be downloaded for free on itch.io.

Hello Charlotte games:

  • Hello Charlotte EP1 (2015) is a story about a memory of long-gone gods and loss of individuality, where your Puppet's new friend goes missing among the static.
    It is available for free download as a demo and on itch.io:
    https://etherane.itch.io/hello-charlotte-ep1.
  • Hello Charlotte EP2 (2016) is a story lamenting the impossibility of universal happiness, and idolization of those out of our reach. As her mind unravels, ink will flow, and blood-red flowers will bloom in the desolate field.
  • Hello Charlotte: Delirium (2017) is a spin-off minigame made to test some of the RPG Maker features. It's a red herring.
  • Hello Charlotte EP3 (2018) is the final story in the series, serving as a prologue and an epilogue to the main plot. A prosumer noise machine, a virulent insect, an obscene revelation — and an earnest thank you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels desktop resolution
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
